remarks: Subspace span of union is a subset of subspace join.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2014.)
statement:
djhspss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhspss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhspss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhspss.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
djhspss.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhspss.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
djhspss.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
djhspss.y $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ V ) $.
djhspss $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( X u. Y ) ) C_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) $.
